name: WarioWare Gold
summary:
The infamous schemer, Wario, is back! 
 
Play his brand-new microgame collection, where you’ll have seconds to complete 300 different microgames. Better think fast to succeed! You’ll use the touchscreen, tilt the system, push buttons, and rock the mic as you laugh through fully voiced stories featuring new and classic characters!

alternative_names.name: メイド イン ワリオ ゴージャス

esrb.synopsis: This is a collection of mini-games, featuring Wario and his friends, in which players compete in a series of mashing, twisting, and tapping/touch games. Some mini-games depict acts of “cartoony” violence: bashing mummies into pieces; knocking opponents down in a boxing match; throwing ninja stars at an incoming ninja. A handful of games depict “poo coils,” nose picking, and characters running towards bathroom stalls; one game depicts a character emitting flatulence, which obscures the players' screen with a gas cloud.

pegi.synopsis: This game has received a PEGI 7 because it features non-realistic violence in a child-friendly setting or context and mild violence that lacks any apparent harm or injury to human like characters. Not suitable for persons below 7 years of age.
